Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Picture windows to the north and west fill the room with light from the outside, additional lighting from the massive chandelier overhead doing little to brighten the rich sanguine color of the room's decor and furnishings. Floral patterned brocade wallpaper covers all four walls above a waist-high mahogany bookcase that surrounds the entire periphery of the room, the rich wood tones mirroring those found in the ornately carved desk that stands prominently at the center of a gold and burgundy persian rug. Chaises in sanguine-hued velvet stand to the southeast of the desk, the upholstery matching the plush armchair that stands opposite. Sheer silk drapes in a contrasting pale gold color flank not only the windows, but also the doors, the fabric pooling at the floor in sumptuous folds.

Picture windows to the north and west fill the room with light from the outside, additional lighting from the massive chandelier overhead doing little to brighten the rich sanguine color of the room's decor and furnishings. Floral patterned brocade wallpaper covers all four walls above a waist-high mahogany bookcase that surrounds the entire periphery of the room, the rich wood tones mirroring those found in the ornately carved desk that stands prominently at the center of a gold and burgundy persian rug. Chaises in sanguine-hued velvet stand to the southeast of the desk, the upholstery matching the plush armchair that stands opposite. Sheer silk drapes in a contrasting pale gold color flank not only the windows, but also the doors, the fabric pooling at the floor in sumptuous folds.

Picture windows to the north and west fill the room with light from the outside, additional lighting from the massive chandelier overhead doing little to brighten the rich sanguine color of the room's decor and furnishings. Floral patterned brocade wallpaper covers all four walls above a waist-high mahogany bookcase that surrounds the entire periphery of the room, the rich wood tones mirroring those found in the ornately carved desk that stands prominently at the center of a gold and burgundy persian rug. Chaises in sanguine-hued velvet stand to the southeast of the desk, the upholstery matching the plush armchair that stands opposite. Sheer silk drapes in a contrasting pale gold color flank not only the windows, but also the doors, the fabric pooling at the floor in sumptuous folds.
an arched double door leading northeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the northeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading southwest

Each side of the arched double door leading to the southwest is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
